name: Interactive Time Series Analytics
description: Web platform allowing for the interactive exploration of time series similarity. Allows users to explore connections betweens sequences using dynammic time warping and visually displaying the results.

name: genex
description: System for fast and accurate time series similarity searches. Utilizes a theoretically novel and performant system that allows users to use a generalized dynammic timewarping with any distance function. Distance function can be implemented by extending an interface and implementing the disance in a manner as directed in the paper.

name: gdtw
description: Theoretically novel and performant system that allows users to use a generalized dynammic timewarping with any distance function. Distance function can be implemented by extending an interface and implementing the disance in a manner as directed in the paper.

name: Counting Sea Lion Populations
description: Saving the declining Steller sea lions in the West- ern Aleutian Islands has been a focus of scien- tists at the NOAA Fisheries Alaska Fisheries Sci- ence Center. In order to understand factors that may be preventing the Stellerâ€™s populations from resurging, NOAA collected aerial photographs and counted the different groups within the pop- ulation. As part of a competition hosted by Kag- gle, we developed Deep Learning techniques to automate the process. We experimented with both density counting and object detection ap- proaches, but found little success.

name: Insight: Time Series Analytics
description: A precursor to Interactive Time Series Analytics, this was initial work and system building for the web platform allowing for the interactive exploration of time series similarity. Allows users to explore connections betweens sequences using dynammic time warping and visually displaying the results.
status: Undergraduate Conference for Research IEEE MIT
